title.rendered: Customer Service Representative / Collections | Tulsa, OK

content.rendered:
Customer Service / Collections | Tulsa, OK Midtown Tulsa company seeking immediate candidates for Customer Service Representatives position. Employer works with area and regional court systems, conducting account managing, administrating collection payments, and managing court files. Candidates selected for the position will be working in administrative duties and account management within a call center environment. Customer Service / Collections Preferences:
  • Individuals comfortable taking initiative, and effective problem solvers with great time management is preferred
  • Outgoing, personable professionals with sales, collections, or accounts receivables experience a bonus
Customer Service / Collections Requirements:
  • Employees will be expected to maintain caseloads and medium-high call volumes regularly
Customer Service / Collections Compensation: Compensation begins at $12-13/hr, based on experience, with large potential for bonus based on work completion and individual successes.
